meaningMnemonic: If you have <kanji>not</kanji> <kanji>cleanse</kanji>d yourself you're going to be covered in <vocabulary>uncleanliness</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>dirtiness</vocabulary>. Eww.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
